short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen to the original Neon Genesis Evangelion endings on Netflix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netflix removed Fly Me To The Moon from Neon Genesis Evangelion and put Rei I instead. With this extension, you can the original ending theme of all the episodes as if they didn't change a thing.
